title: T206 Cy Young Portrait SGC Graded
author: SetBuilder

posts.post_title: T206 Cy Young Portrait SGC Graded
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a T206 Cy Young portrait.  Graded Poor by SGC due to holes punched through the top left and right corners, else very good.  The back has minimal specs of paper loss.  Excellent eye appeal at a bargain price for a very expensive and coveted card in the T206 set.  

Price:  SOLD shipped, PayPal F/F. 

Please see images (excuse the poor quality, they we taken on my phone).

With a longer gold chain it would make a lovely necklace for the little lady that I would call

"Young At Heart"
